Package com.lukflug.panelstudio.tabgui

Interface TabGUIRenderer

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultRenderer
public interface TabGUIRenderer
An Interface to abstract the rendering of TabGUI containers.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getBorder()
    Get the default component distance between parent and child container.
    ColorScheme getColorScheme()
    Returns the default color scheme.
    int getHeight()
    Get the default component height.
    boolean isDownKey​(int key)
    Check whether key scancode is down key.
    boolean isEscapeKey​(int key)
    Check whether key scancode is escape key.
    boolean isSelectKey​(int key)
    Check whether key scancode is select key.
    boolean isUpKey​(int key)
    Check whether key scancode is up key.
    void renderBackground​(Context context, int offset, int height)
    Renders the background of a component.
    void renderCaption​(Context context, java.lang.String caption, int index, int height, boolean active)
    Renders the caption of a child in a container.

  • Method Details

    • getHeight

      int getHeight()
      Get the default component height.
      Returns:
      component height

    • getBorder

      int getBorder()
      Get the default component distance between parent and child container.
      Returns:
      component border

    • renderBackground

      void renderBackground​(Context context, int offset, int height)
      Renders the background of a component.
      Parameters:
      context - the current context
      offset - the vertical position of the text highlight
      height - the height of the text highlight and of single components

    • renderCaption

      void renderCaption​(Context context, java.lang.String caption, int index, int height, boolean active)
      Renders the caption of a child in a container.
      Parameters:
      context - the current context
      caption - caption of the child in question
      index - the index of the child in the container
      height - the height of a single child component
      active - whether the child component is active

    • getColorScheme

      ColorScheme getColorScheme()
      Returns the default color scheme.
      Returns:
      the color scheme

    • isUpKey

      boolean isUpKey​(int key)
      Check whether key scancode is up key.
      Parameters:
      key - scancode in question
      Returns:
      true if key is up key

    • isDownKey

      boolean isDownKey​(int key)
      Check whether key scancode is down key.
      Parameters:
      key - scancode in question
      Returns:
      true if key is down key

    • isSelectKey

      boolean isSelectKey​(int key)
      Check whether key scancode is select key.
      Parameters:
      key - scancode in question
      Returns:
      true if key is select key

    • isEscapeKey

      boolean isEscapeKey​(int key)
      Check whether key scancode is escape key.
      Parameters:
      key - scancode in question
      Returns:
